page.title: 05LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There are many organisations for children.Girls join the guides movement and the girls brigade.The boys can join boys brigade and the scouts.These are very popular because you can meet new friends,play team games,do badges,march and go on outings and holidays.Younger children can join the playgroup where mothers take turns to help or the nursery school which has paid helpers.Children can also join the tennis club or play badminton in the church hall.The angling club has also a junior section.The problem starts at teenage when many leave the organisations except to go to the discos.Most teenagers go to each other's house to play records or watch videos.There was a youth club in Eaglesham in the school but a gang of youths regulary broke it up so other young people
